summary:
MSD Knowledge Base - Vol 06: Simulation Core (Causal Logic).
This document is the "Physics Engine" that binds the Mega-Scale volumes together.
- Defines 15 System States (Green/Blue/Yellow/Red/Grey).
- Maps "Effect Trees" for every major failure (Coolant -> Breach, Shield -> SIF).
- Includes the 'Bot Decision Matrix' for damage control.
